transcript: I will never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? All I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

segments.text: I will never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? All I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I will never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  All I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.
